00056 //our defines
00057 #define SPACE_BETWEEN_PARTS 5
00058 #define RIGHT_BORDER 15
00059 #define LEFT_BORDER 15
00060 #define LOWER_BORDER 10
00061 #define UPPER_BORDER 10
00062 
00063 #define ITEM_TEXT_SIZE 8
00064 #define LABEL_TEXT_SIZE 6
00065 
00066 //used for the shift between the bars
00067 #define BAR_DELTAX 4
00068 #define BAR_DELTAY 2
00069 #define BAR_WIDTH 2+2*BAR_DELTAX  //should be equal or bigger than the label font size
00070 //used for the text below the bars
00071 #define BAR_LOWER_BORDER 100
00072 
00073 #define LEGEND_INNER_BORDER 5
00074 #define LEGEND_DELTAY 4
00075 #define LEGEND_WIDTH 85
00076 
00077 CSearchDialogAnalysis::CSearchDialogAnalysis(QObject *parent, const char *name )
00078     : QCanvas(parent,name) {
00079 
00080   m_scaleFactor = 0.0;
00081   m_legend = 0;
00082     setBackgroundColor(Qt::white);  
00083     m_canvasItemList.resize(67);
00084     m_canvasItemList.setAutoDelete(true);
00085     resize(1,1);
00086     connect(this, SIGNAL(resized()), SLOT(slotResized()));
00087 }
00088 
00089 CSearchDialogAnalysis::~CSearchDialogAnalysis(){
00090   qWarning("CSearchDialogAnalysis::~CSearchDialogAnalysis()");
00091   reset(); // deletes the legend and the items
00092 }

00094 QDict<CSearchDialogAnalysisItem>* CSearchDialogAnalysis::getSearchAnalysisItemList(){
00095     // Returns pointer to the search analysis items
00096     return &m_canvasItemList;
00097 }

00100 void CSearchDialogAnalysis::analyse(){
00101     qDebug("void CSearchDialogAnalysis::analyse()");
00110     m_lastPosList.clear();      
00111     const int numberOfModules = m_moduleList.count();
00112     if (!numberOfModules)
00113         return; 
00114     m_legend = new CSearchDialogAnalysisLegendItem(this, &m_moduleList);    
00115     m_legend->setX(LEFT_BORDER);
00116     m_legend->setY(UPPER_BORDER);
00117     m_legend->setSize(LEGEND_WIDTH,
00118                LEGEND_INNER_BORDER*2 + ITEM_TEXT_SIZE*numberOfModules + LEGEND_DELTAY*(numberOfModules-1));
00119   m_legend->show(); 
00120 
00121   int xPos = LEFT_BORDER + m_legend->width() + SPACE_BETWEEN_PARTS;         
00122     int moduleIndex = 0;    
00123     m_maxCount = 0; 
00124     int count = 0;
00125     CSwordVerseKey key(0);  
00126     key.key("Genesis 1:1"); 
00127     
00128     CSearchDialogAnalysisItem* analysisItem = m_canvasItemList[key.book()];
00129     bool ok = true;
00130     while (ok && analysisItem) {
00131         for (moduleIndex = 0,m_moduleList.first(); m_moduleList.current(); m_moduleList.next(),++moduleIndex) {
00132             KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents(10);
00133             if (!m_lastPosList.contains(m_moduleList.current()))
00134                 m_lastPosList.insert(m_moduleList.current(),0);
00135             analysisItem->setCountForModule(moduleIndex, (count = getCount(key.book(),m_moduleList.current())));
00136             m_maxCount = (count > m_maxCount) ? count : m_maxCount;
00137         }
00138         analysisItem->setX(xPos);
00139         analysisItem->setY(UPPER_BORDER);
00140         analysisItem->show();
00141         
00142         xPos += (int)analysisItem->width() + SPACE_BETWEEN_PARTS;
00143         ok = key.next(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook);     
00144     analysisItem = m_canvasItemList[key.book()];
00145     }
00146     resize(xPos+BAR_WIDTH+(m_moduleList.count()-1)*BAR_DELTAX+RIGHT_BORDER, height() ); 
00147     slotResized();
00148 }
00149 
00151 void CSearchDialogAnalysis::setModuleList(ListCSwordModuleInfo& modules){
00152 //  ASSERT(modules);
00153     m_moduleList.clear();
00154     for (modules.first(); modules.current(); modules.next())
00155         if ( modules.current()->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || modules.current()->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary )//a Bible or an commentary
00156             m_moduleList.append(modules.current());
00157 
00158     m_canvasItemList.clear();
00159     CSearchDialogAnalysisItem* analysisItem = 0;    
00160     CSwordVerseKey key(0);  
00161     key.key("Genesis 1:1");
00162     do {
00163     analysisItem = new CSearchDialogAnalysisItem(this, m_moduleList.count(), key.book(), &m_scaleFactor, &m_moduleList);
00164     analysisItem->hide();
00165         m_canvasItemList.insert(key.book(), analysisItem);
00166     } while (key.next(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook));
00167     update();
00168 }
00169 
00171 void CSearchDialogAnalysis::reset(){
00172     m_scaleFactor = 0.0;
00173   QDictIterator<CSearchDialogAnalysisItem> it( m_canvasItemList ); // iterator for items
00174     while ( it.current() ) {
00175         it.current()->hide();
00176         ++it;
00177     }   
00178     m_lastPosList.clear();  
00179     
00180     if (m_legend)
00181         m_legend->hide();
00182     delete m_legend;
00183     m_legend = 0;   
00184     update();
00185 }
00186 
00188 void CSearchDialogAnalysis::slotResized(){
00189     m_scaleFactor = (double)( (double)(height()-UPPER_BORDER-LOWER_BORDER-BAR_LOWER_BORDER-(m_moduleList.count()-1)*BAR_DELTAY)
00190                                         /(double)m_maxCount);   
00191     QDictIterator<CSearchDialogAnalysisItem> it( m_canvasItemList );
00192     while ( it.current() ) {
00193         it.current()->setSize(BAR_WIDTH + (m_moduleList.count()-1)*BAR_DELTAX, height()-UPPER_BORDER-LOWER_BORDER);
00194         it.current()->setY(UPPER_BORDER);
00195     ++it;
00196     }
00197     update();
00198 }
00199 
00201 QColor CSearchDialogAnalysis::getColor(int index){
00202   switch (index){
00203     case  0: return Qt::red;
00204     case    1: return Qt::darkGreen;
00205     case  2: return Qt::blue;
00206     case  3: return Qt::cyan;
00207     case  4: return Qt::magenta;
00208     case  5: return Qt::darkRed;
00209     case  6: return Qt::darkGray;
00210     case  7: return Qt::black;
00211     case  8: return Qt::darkCyan;
00212     case  9: return Qt::darkMagenta;
00213     default: return Qt::red;
00214   }
00215 }
00216 
00218 const unsigned int CSearchDialogAnalysis::getCount( const QString book, CSwordModuleInfo* module ){
00219     ListKey& result = module->searchResult();
00220     const int length = book.length();   
00221     unsigned int i = m_lastPosList[module];
00222     unsigned int count = 0;
00223     const unsigned int resultCount = result.Count();
00224     while (i < resultCount) {
00225         if ( strncmp(book.local8Bit(), (const char*)*result.GetElement(i), length) )        
00226             break;
00227         i++;
00228         ++count;        
00229     }
00230     m_lastPosList.contains(module) ? m_lastPosList.replace(module,i) : m_lastPosList.insert(module,i);
00231 //  m_lastPosList.replace(module,i);
00232     return count;
00233 }

00239 CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::CSearchDialogAnalysisItem(QCanvas *parent, const int moduleCount, const QString &bookname, double *scaleFactor, ListCSwordModuleInfo* modules)
00240     : QCanvasRectangle(parent), m_moduleList( modules ), m_scaleFactor(scaleFactor),
00241     m_moduleCount(moduleCount), m_bookName(bookname), m_bufferPixmap(0)
00242 {   
00243     m_resultCountArray.resize(m_moduleCount);
00244     int index = 0;
00245     for (index = 0; index < m_moduleCount; ++index)
00246         m_resultCountArray[index] = 0;
00247 }

00250 //  qWarning("CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::~CSearchDialogAnalysisItem()");
00251 //  if (m_bufferPixmap)
00252         delete m_bufferPixmap;
00253 }

00256 void CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::setCountForModule( const int moduleIndex, const int count) {
00257     m_resultCountArray[moduleIndex] = count;
00258 }
00259 
00261 int CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::getCountForModule( const int moduleIndex) {
00262     return m_resultCountArray[moduleIndex];
00263 }
00264 
00266 void CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::draw(QPainter& painter) {
00267     QFont f = painter.font();
00268     f.setPointSize(ITEM_TEXT_SIZE);
00269     painter.setFont(f);
00270     
00271     setPen(QPen(black,1));
00272     setBrush(Qt::red);
00277     int index = 0;  
00278     int drawn = 0;
00279     int Value = 0;
00280     
00281     //find out the biggest value
00282     for (index=0;index < m_moduleCount; index++)
00283       if (m_resultCountArray[index] > Value)
00284         Value = m_resultCountArray[index];
00285     
00286     while (drawn < m_moduleCount){
00287     for (index=0; index < m_moduleCount; index++){
00288       if (m_resultCountArray[index] == Value){
00289             QPoint p1(x()+(m_moduleCount-drawn-1)*BAR_DELTAX,
00290                       height()+y()-BAR_LOWER_BORDER-(m_moduleCount-drawn)*BAR_DELTAY);
00291             QPoint p2(p1.x() + BAR_WIDTH,
00292                       p1.y() - (!m_resultCountArray[index] ? 0 : ((m_resultCountArray[index])*(*m_scaleFactor))) );
00293             QRect r(p1, p2);
00294             painter.fillRect(r, QBrush(CSearchDialogAnalysis::getColor(index)) );
00295             painter.drawRect(r);
00296             drawn++;
00297       }
00298     }
00299     //finds the next smaller value
00300       int newValue = 0;
00301         for (index=0;index < m_moduleCount; index++)
00302       if (m_resultCountArray[index] < Value && m_resultCountArray[index] >= newValue)
00303         newValue = m_resultCountArray[index];
00304     Value = newValue;
00305     }       
00306     if (!m_bufferPixmap) {
00307         m_bufferPixmap = new QPixmap();
00308         m_bufferPixmap->resize(width(),BAR_LOWER_BORDER);
00309         m_bufferPixmap->fill();     
00310         QPainter p(m_bufferPixmap);             
00311         f = p.font();
00312         f.setPointSize(ITEM_TEXT_SIZE);
00313         p.setFont(f);       
00314         p.rotate(90);
00315         p.drawText(QPoint(5,0), m_bookName);
00316     }
00317     painter.drawPixmap(QPoint(x(),height()+y()-BAR_LOWER_BORDER), *m_bufferPixmap);
00318 }
00319 
00321 int CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::width(){
00322     return m_moduleCount*(m_moduleCount>1 ? BAR_DELTAX : 0) + BAR_WIDTH;    
00323 }
00324 
00326 const QString CSearchDialogAnalysisItem::getToolTip(){
00327     QString ret = QString::fromLatin1("<CENTER><B>%1</B></CENTER><HR>").arg(m_bookName);
00328     ret.append("<TABLE CELLPADDING=\"3\" WIDTH=\"100%\" ALIGN=\"center\">");
00329     for (int i = 0; i < m_moduleCount; ++i) {
00330         CSwordModuleInfo* info = m_moduleList->at(i);
00331         const QColor c = CSearchDialogAnalysis::getColor(i);
00332         ret.append(
00333             QString::fromLatin1("<TR BGCOLOR=\"white\"><TD><B><FONT COLOR=\"#%1\">%2</FONT></B></TD><TD>%3</TD></TR>")
00334                 .arg(QString().sprintf("%02X%02X%02X",c.red(),c.green(),c.blue()))
00335                 .arg(info ? info->name() : QString::null)
00336                 .arg(m_resultCountArray[i])
00337         );
00338     }
00339     ret.append("</TABLE>");         
00340     return ret;
00341 }

00371 void CSearchDialogAnalysisView::ToolTip::maybeTip(const QPoint& p) {
00372     CSearchDialogAnalysisView* view = dynamic_cast<CSearchDialogAnalysisView*>(parentWidget());
00373     if (!view)
00374         return;
00375     QPoint point(p);
00376     point = view->viewport()->mapFrom(view, point);
00377     CSearchDialogAnalysisItem* i = view->itemAt( view->viewportToContents(point) );
00378     if (!i)
00379         return;
00380                 
00381     //get type of item and display correct text
00382     QString text = i->getToolTip();
00383     if (text.isEmpty())
00384         return;
00385     
00386     QPoint p1 = view->viewport()->mapTo(view, view->contentsToViewport(i->rect().topLeft()));
00387     p1.setY(0); 
00388     QPoint p2 = view->viewport()->mapTo(view, view->contentsToViewport(i->rect().bottomRight()));
00389     p2.setY(view->height());    
00390     QRect r = QRect( p1, p2 );  
00391     if (r.contains(p))
00392         tip(r, text);
00393 }
00394 
00395 
00397 CSearchDialogAnalysisItem* CSearchDialogAnalysisView::itemAt( const QPoint& p ){
00398     QCanvasItemList l = canvas()->collisions(p);
00399     if (!l.count())
00400         return 0;
00401     return dynamic_cast<CSearchDialogAnalysisItem*>(l.first()); 
00402 }

00413 void CSearchDialogAnalysisLegendItem::draw (QPainter& painter) {    
00414     painter.save();
00415         
00416     setPen( QPen(black,2) );
00417     setBrush( Qt::white );
00418   //the outer rectangle
00419   QPoint p1(x(),y());
00420   QPoint p2(x()+width(), y()+height());
00421   QRect r(p1, p2);
00422   r.normalize();
00423     painter.drawRect(r);
00424     
00425   QFont f = painter.font();
00426   f.setPointSize(ITEM_TEXT_SIZE);
00427   painter.setFont(f);
00428     
00429     for (unsigned int index=0; index < m_moduleList->count(); index++){
00430       // the module color indicators
00431       QPoint p1(x()+LEGEND_INNER_BORDER, y() + LEGEND_INNER_BORDER + index*(LEGEND_DELTAY + ITEM_TEXT_SIZE));
00432       QPoint p2( p1.x() + ITEM_TEXT_SIZE, p1.y() + ITEM_TEXT_SIZE);
00433       QRect r(p1,p2);
00434         painter.fillRect(r, QBrush(CSearchDialogAnalysis::getColor(index)) );
00435         r.normalize();
00436         painter.drawRect(r);
00437         
00438         QPoint p3( p2.x() + LEGEND_INNER_BORDER, p2.y() );
00439     painter.drawText(p3, m_moduleList->at(index)->name() );
00440     }
00441   painter.restore();
00442 }
